Interface MessageHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessageComposer, MessageComposerExtraFormat
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageHandlerFactory.Composer, AbstractMessageHandlerFactory.Handler

    public interface MessageHandler
    An object that represents a message.
    See Also:
    MessageHandlerFactory, MessageComposer, MessageCreator
